text:
Should I Wear a Mask to Protect Against #Coronavirus?

Only wear a mask if you are ill with #COVID19 symptoms, i.e coughing or looking after someone who may have #COVID. Disposable face mask cab only be used once.

#COVID19NIGERIA
#CoronaVirusUpdate
#Chloroquine
